remarks: If a relation graph is closed, then an image set of a singleton is also closed.  Corollary of proposition 4 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  I.26. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Jan-2018.)
statement:
imasnopn.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
imasncld $p |- ( ( ( J e. Top /\ K e. Top ) /\ ( R e. ( Clsd ` ( J tX K ) ) /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( R " { A } ) e. ( Clsd ` K ) ) $.
